API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.2

sandy.util.BitmapUtil

type
class
version
3.1
Utility class for Bitmap calculations.

Static Methods

burnShapeTexture(obj : sandy.core.scenegraph.Shape3D, scene : sandy.core.Scene3D, srcTexture : flash.display.BitmapData, dstTexture : flash.display.BitmapData, ?ambient : Float, ?diffuse : Float, ?specular : Float, ?gloss : Float) : Void

parameters
obj Shape for texture to be applied to.
light Scene you are going to render shape in.
srcTexture Source texture.
dstTexture Destination texture.
ambient Ambient reflection factor.
diffuse Diffuse reflection factor.
specular Specular reflection factor.
gloss Specular exponent.
returns
Pre-lit texture map.
Computes shape texture map pre-lit with Phong directional light source. Shape must be made of triangles.

concatBitmapMatrix(p_oM1 : Dynamic, p_oM2 : Dynamic) : Dynamic

parameters
p_oM1 The matrix of the first bitmap.
p_oM2 The matrix of the second bitmap.
returns
The resulting matrix.
Returns a concatenation of two bitmap matrices.

<strong>ToDo</strong>: Explain what matrices are handled here

getScaledBitmap(p_oBitmap : flash.display.BitmapData, p_nScalex : Float, ?p_nScaley : Float) : flash.display.BitmapData

parameters
p_oBitmap The bitmap to scale.
p_nScalex The x-scale.
p_nScaley The y-scale.
returns
The scaled bitmap data.
Returns a scaled version of a bitmap.

The method takes a bitmap as input, and returns a scaled copy.
The original is not changed.

movieToBitmap(p_oSprite : flash.display.DisplayObject, ?p_bTransparent : Bool, ?p_nColor : Int) : flash.display.BitmapData

parameters
p_oSprite The sprite or other DisplayObject to convert to BitmapData. (DisplayObject allows support for AVM1Movie)
p_bTransparent Whether to allow transparency.
p_nColor Background color (32 bit).
returns
The converted bitmap.
Converts a sprite to a bitmap respecting the sprite position.

The simple BitmapData.draw method doesn't take care of the negative part of the sprite during the draw.
This method does.

ripShapeTexture(obj : sandy.core.scenegraph.Shape3D, ?size : Float) : flash.display.Sprite

parameters
obj Shape to rip texture template from.
size Template size (will be size x size pixels).
returns
Sprite with texture map template drawn in.
Creates shape texture map template. This is useful for 3rd party models texturing :)
